name: Syneshift
description:
Catch the notes (circles) to add points, dodge the spikes (squares) or lose your combo. Switch between lanes and extend your wings to catch points, but be careful! If one of your support ships in your wings hits a spike they're gone for the rest of the level.

[A][S][D] - Change your lane
[SPACE] - Extend your wings!

Mouse for the menus

Enjoy!
